text: I remember that the sum of a geometric series Sum_{k=0}^∞ ar^k is a/(1 - r), but here we start at k=2 instead of k=0.

text: The sum from k=n to infinity of ar^k is (ar^n)/(1 - r) if |r| < 1.

text: So in our case, for each j, the inner sum is Sum_{k=2}^∞ (1/j)^k.
